name: Sunset Jazz & Jollof
description: Experience the soothing sounds of live saxophonists while enjoying unlimited smoky Jollof Rice as the sun sets over the Lekki-Ikoyi Link Bridge.

name: Afrobeats Party Boat
description: The ultimate Friday night starter! DJ Spinall on the decks, open bar for the first hour, and nonstop energy cruising past Victoria Island.

name: Sunday Brunch on Water
description: A premium buffet featuring English breakfast classics and Nigerian favorites like Akara and Pap. Perfect for families.

name: Corporate Networking Mixer
description: Connect with Lagos' top executives in a serene environment. Includes canapés, cocktails, and a keynote speech.

name: Romantic Star-Gazing
description: A private table for two on the upper deck. Includes a 3-course meal, a bottle of wine, and live violin music.

name: Tarkwa Bay Beach Escape
description: Cruise to Tarkwa Bay for a day of surfing and relaxation. Includes boat transport and a light lunch box.

name: Cultural Heritage Tour
description: Learn the history of Lagos waterways, from the colonial era to modern day Eko Atlantic. Guided by a historian.

name: Suya & Sips Night
description: Unlimited Suya (Beef & Chicken) paired with signature Chapman cocktails. Casual vibe with old school music.

name: Eko Atlantic Sightseeing
description: See the new face of Lagos. A guided tour around the perimeter of the Great Wall of Lagos and the new city.

name: Seafood Extravaganza
description: For seafood lovers! Fresh prawns, lobster, and calamari grilled right on the deck. Includes white wine pairing.

name: Owambe Floating Party
description: Lagos style party on a boat! Live fuji band, money spraying allowed, and plenty of Amala.

name: New Year's Eve Countdown
description: The most exclusive event of the year. Watch the fireworks from the middle of the lagoon. Champagne toast at midnight.

name: Photography Masterclass
description: Capture the Lagos skyline from unique angles. Led by a pro photographer. Bring your own camera.

name: Comedy Club Cruise
description: Laugh your ribs off with Nigeria's funniest stand-up comedians. A night of jokes and laughter on the waves.

name: Wellness & Yoga Morning
description: Start your day with peace. Guided yoga session on the open deck followed by green smoothies.
